Articles.Content: The white base modules with the inflatable tubes are what i am looking most forward too in the pack. They really look perfect.

The white base modules with the inflatable tubes are what i am looking most forward too in the pack. They really look perfect.
That Duna base setup looks better than Bobcat's HOME's. I want them

I NEED THEM

Let's not overlook that Bobcat made those extendable dock ports as well as many other items critical to the base concepts detailed here. He has moved on to some very detailed systems with Home 2 which have their own fantastic merits. I do recommend checking out some of his recent Home 2 videos where you can see the level of game play detail that he wants to develop. He's moved on from these parts but we are using them because they are based on real NASA engineering, which is the guiding principle of Chaka Monkey Exploration Systems. With Bobcat's Home 2 project you get an entirely different gameplay experience, it's just a matter of what excites each user the most about Kerbal space flight.

Edited January 15, 2014 by YANFRET

Hey guys all is well but I'm taking a break from this because we got some great news for our family so I will come back to ya but something I've been working on for 5 years was just approved and that's gonna take priority obviously

I will not leave you hanging this project will get finished... please stand by.

LIFE IS AWESOME!!!

You guys are great. I promise I'l be back. Gotta paint my house for a minute lol

potato of death lol

Talisar Aerospace Large Upper Stage fitment test

Just to say again, this project is "officially" on hold while I focus on wonderful things in real life. That said, I have made certain promises to you guys and you have my word that as time allows, work will continue. I'm gonna say this now and let it never be questioned: This Project Will Get Finished! Full Stop. You may need to be patient with me for a several weeks however.

Anyway, I will get the TALUS part done asap so you guys can have it. You will find official updates on that in Talisar's thread. Textures soon.

Edited January 16, 2014 by YANFRET
